tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE palm_vein_biometrics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  vein_data BYTEA NOT NULL,
  scan_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE PalmVeinUsers (
    user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    palm_vein_data BYTEA NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
)

CREATE TABLE PalmVeinAccessLogs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    access_time TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
    granted BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES PalmVeinUsers(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE PalmVeinAdmins (
    admin_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    password TEXT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
)

CREATE TABLE PalmVeinDevices (
    device_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    status BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
)

CREATE TABLE PalmVeinSettings (
    setting_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    setting_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    setting_value TEXT NOT NULL
)
